definitions.definition: To concentrate toward the essence by making more close , compact , or dense , thereby decreasing size or volume .
examples: An abridged dictionary can be further condensed to pocket size.
Boiling off water condenses a thin sauce into a soupier mixture.

definitions.definition: To transform from a gaseous state into a liquid state via condensation .
To be transformed from a gaseous state into a liquid state.
examples: Water condenses on the window on cold days because of the warm air inside.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To concentrate toward the essence by making more close , compact , or dense , thereby decreasing size or volume .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , chemistry ) To transform from a gaseous state into a liquid state via condensation .
( intransitive , chemistry ) To be transformed from a gaseous state into a liquid state.
